Token.Abstract: An RMMarker object is used for simple point annotations on a map view, represented as a single image. RMMarker objects do not change in size when the map view zooms in or out, but instead stay the same size to consistently represent a point on the map view.
A custom label for the marker. The label is shown when first set.
A custom label for the marker. The label is shown when first set.
The marker object's label text foreground color. Defaults to black.
The marker object's label text foreground color. Defaults to black.
The marker object's label text background color. Defaults to clear.
The marker object's label text background color. Defaults to clear.
The font used for labels when another font is not explicitly requested. The default is the system font with size 15.
Initializes and returns a newly allocated marker object using the specified image.

Parameter.Name: image
Parameter.Abstract: An image to use for the marker.

Token.Abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated marker object using the specified image and anchor point.

Parameter.Name: image
Parameter.Abstract: An image to use for the marker.

Parameter.Name: anchorPoint
Parameter.Abstract: A point representing a range from 0 to 1 in each of the height and width coordinate space, normalized to the size of the image, at which to place the image.

Token.Abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated marker object using a red, medium-sized star pin image.
Initializes and returns a newly allocated marker object using a red, medium-sized pin image and a given symbol name, e.g., bus.

Parameter.Name: symbolName
Parameter.Abstract: A symbol name from the Maki icon set.

Token.Abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated marker object using a medium-sized pin image, a given symbol name, e.g., bus, and a given color.

Parameter.Name: symbolName
Parameter.Abstract: A symbol name from the Maki icon set.

Parameter.Name: color
Parameter.Abstract: A color for the marker.

Token.Abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated marker object using a pin image, a given symbol name, e.g., bus, a given color, and a given size.

Parameter.Name: symbolName
Parameter.Abstract: A symbol name from the Maki icon set.

Parameter.Name: color
Parameter.Abstract: A color for the marker.

Parameter.Name: size
Parameter.Abstract: A size for the marker.

Token.Abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated marker object using a medium-sized pin image, a given symbol name, e.g., bus, and a given HTML hex color, e.g., ff0000.

Parameter.Name: symbolName
Parameter.Abstract: A symbol name from the Maki icon set.

Parameter.Name: colorHex
Parameter.Abstract: A color for the marker specified as an HTML hex code.

Token.Abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated marker object using a pin image, a given symbol name, e.g., bus, a given HTML hex color, e.g., ff0000, and a given size, e.g., large.

Parameter.Name: symbolName
Parameter.Abstract: A symbol name from the Maki icon set.

Parameter.Name: colorHex
Parameter.Abstract: A color for the marker specified as an HTML hex code.

Parameter.Name: sizeString
Parameter.Abstract: A size such as small, medium, or large.

Token.Abstract: Clears the local cache of Mapbox Marker images. Images are cached locally upon first use so that if the application goes offline, markers can still be used.
Changes the label to a UILabel with the supplied text and default marker font and using the existing text foreground and background colors.

Parameter.Name: text
Parameter.Abstract: The text for the label.

Token.Abstract: Changes the label to a UILabel with the supplied text and font and using the given text foreground and background colors.

Parameter.Name: text
Parameter.Abstract: The text for the label.

Parameter.Name: font
Parameter.Abstract: A font to use for the label text.

Parameter.Name: textColor
Parameter.Abstract: The color for the label text.

Parameter.Name: backgroundColor
Parameter.Abstract: The color for the label background.

Token.Abstract: Toggle the display of the marker's label, if any. If hidden, show and if shown, hide.
Show the marker's label, if any.
Hide the marker's label, if any.
Replace the image for a marker.

Parameter.Name: image
Parameter.Abstract: An image to use for the marker.

Token.Abstract: Replace the image for a marker using a custom anchor point.

Parameter.Name: image
Parameter.Abstract: An image to use for the marker.

Parameter.Name: anchorPoint
Parameter.Abstract: A point representing a range from 0 to 1 in each of the height and width coordinate space, normalized to the size of the image, at which to place the image.
